refnamediv.refpurpose: set process UID and GID(s) then chain

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: setuidgid-fromenv is a chain-loading utility that sets the process real+effective UID and real+effective GID to the values given in the UID and GID environment variables and then chain loads to next-prog with the execvp3 function.
next-prog may contain its own command line options, which setuidgid-fromenv will ignore.
If it fails setting the group or user IDs, it does not chain and exits with status code 111.
